branchCategory.name: NC(D)A1 NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double or Single Rod, Dual Operation
branchCategory.description: <p>NCA1 single rod, dual stroke (XC11) and double rod, dual stroke (XC10), medium duty NFPA interchangeable cylinders. The NCA1 is standard with air cushion, pre-lubricated and available in 11 mounting styles. Bore sizes range from 1.5 to 4 inches.</p>

breadCrumb.name: NC(D)A1 NFPA, Air Cylinder, Double or Single Rod, Dual Operation
